channel.title: How To Fix SilabSoft V4!
channel.description:
Hi guys, I hope I really do help you out and this topic gets stickied because I found this out myself and I wasted 12 hours for you guys. :)
Well first of all, download V4 once again or if you have the non-extracted folder you don't need to. Just make sure you delete the extracted stuff.
Once you have downloaded, extract to your desktop. Then open the folder and move all of it's contents (BESIDES RUN and CLIENT) to...
My Computer -> Local Disk -> WINDOWS -> mpr_file_store_32.
--
If you have not got the mpr_file_store_32, then I think you need to download the original MoparScape (before SilabSoft).
Well I hoped I helped you out to fix V4. :)

item.title: How To Fix SilabSoft V4!
item.dc:creator: @crucio crucio
item.description:
@crucio wrote:

THANK YOU! I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO FIX THIS FOR AGES! NOW IT WORKS!

Read full topic

item.title: How To Fix SilabSoft V4!
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Agreed, There pretty easy to make, Instead of depending on silabs client to always work, And when it doesn’t post stupid errors on the forums, Make your own client, Then you can have a good question to ask the community.

Silabsoft Won’t run <----Depending on silabsoft

How do i change the Title of my client <----Making your own client.

Difference? At least people won’t flame you, And actually help you for the second one.

Sorry about the “big post” I Just didn’t want to get into a conversation over something as little as this

Read full topic

item.title: How To Fix SilabSoft V4!
item.dc:creator: @Jagskilt Jagskilt
item.description:
@Jagskilt wrote:

Sure, lots of people get an error when the run V4 of SilabSoft and this is how to fix it so you can use V4 instead of V5.

In V5 the SilabSoft items arent working and in V4 they are so this is how to fix V4 so you can use SilabSoft items until Miss SilabSoft fixes them in V5/V6.

Read full topic

Hi guys, I hope I really do help you out and this topic gets stickied because I found this out myself and I wasted 12 hours for you guys.

Well first of all, download V4 once again or if you have the non-extracted folder you don’t need to. Just make sure you delete the extracted stuff.

Once you have downloaded, extract to your desktop. Then open the folder and move all of it’s contents (BESIDES RUN and CLIENT) to…

My Computer -> Local Disk -> WINDOWS -> mpr_file_store_32.

If you have not got the mpr_file_store_32, then I think you need to download the original MoparScape (before SilabSoft).
